name: instagram-graph-api
description: Interact with the Instagram Graph API to retrieve user profiles, media posts, hashtags, insights/analytics, comments, and stories. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: instagram_graph_api
toolDefinition.description: Interact with the Instagram Graph API to retrieve user profiles, media posts, hashtags, insights/analytics, comments, and stories. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: get_profile (get user profile), get_media (get a media post), list_media (list user's media), search_hashtag (search hashtags), get_insights (get account analytics), get_comments (get media comments), get_stories (get user's active stories)

userId.description: Instagram user ID. Required for get_profile, list_media, get_insights, get_stories.

mediaId.description: Instagram media ID. Required for get_media, get_comments.

query.description: Search query for hashtag search (max 100 characters). Required for search_hashtag.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. Range varies by action (default: 25).

metrics.description: Metrics for get_insights. Valid values: impressions, reach, profile_views, follower_count. Defaults to all.
